Wordpress For All: How To Create A Website For Business Or Personal Use, Quickly & Easily

Chris O'Connor
2013
Language: English
ASIN: B00AV3X3LE
237 Pages
PDF
3.95 MB

Want to create your own website? Not sure where to start? Confused by buzzwords and jargon?

This up to date book (recently updated to cover Wordpress 3.6) will take you step-by-step through everything you need to know in order to quickly and easily create your own fully functional, attractive and professional looking website. What's more, you'll be able to do all of this without having to understand or write a single line of code.

The author has been actively developing websites in Wordpress since it first came out in 2003, and continues to develop websites in Wordpress for himself and his clients.

In this book he will show you how you too can use Wordpress to create the website you want.

Choosing the best domain name, and why getting this right is so important 

Different types of hosting account, and the key things to look out for when choosing somewhere to host your website
Different (but easy) ways to install Wordpress, as well as how to to set up Wordpress in single site and multi-site mode (something most books shy away from)
Wordpress concepts fully explained.
Before you even create a single post or page you'll discover how to confgure Wordpress so that it is set up correctly,
Options for getting your site looking exactly the way you want it, including how to build your own stunning Wordpress theme -- without having to write a single line of code!
How to change, enhance, and add to Wordpress's functionality through plugins, to get your website to behave exactly as you want.
Securing your site against malware, attacks, and spammers
Setting up your website up for optimal SEO configuration. Having worked as a SEO consultant the author has plenty of great advice to share with you that you won't find elsewhere.
How to easily create the essential pages that every website should have for your site to look credible to customers and the search engines
Different ways to add images and video to your site 
How to write and publish your content, or schedule it to be auto-published at a later date and time
Plus lots more!
